name: ReMaz!
description:
Speed ​​and rhythmNo time for relax. Non-stop journey through space with any music.
The speed of the game depends on your score and the rhythm of the music.Playing with friendsYou can playReMaz! alone or with your friends, all you need to do is to create a lobby and invite them in.Editor and WorkshopCreate your own patterns in the built-in level editor. You can upload yours or download others patterns from the WorkshopLevelupPlay in the ranked matches, increase your level. All progress, that you made in game will be displayed in your profile.BadgesGet unique game badges while playing. They will be displayed in your profile.OtherYou can add any music from your computer to ReMaz!.
The game doesn't take much time, you can enter it for a couple minutes, or for several hours.

Join our community!
